name: Mastermind (Softdisk)
overview: Test your code-cracking prowess with Mastermind, the challenging game of logic and deduction. Your compy sets a secret code, and you, the Codebreaker, try to match the code using logic, deduction, and maybe even a little bit of luck. After each move, the game gives clues to the Codebreaker for you to try again. Published in UpTime Vol.1 #07.
